Information about cloud.
Like Nextcloud settings etc...
And other stuff like:
A button to how to page.

Disroot is a platform providing online services based on principles of freedom, privacy, federation and decentralization.
This app is like your swiss knife to the Disroot platform, made by the community for the community.
If you don't have a Disroot account you can still use this app to access all the Disroot services that do not require an account:
Etherpad, Ethercalc, Private bin, Upload, Poll, Searx and Diaspora (requires a Diaspora only account)

The app may require you to install additional apps, and not all apps can be found on the Play store, So we recommend you to install F-droid market on your device. If you haven't you can download it by tapping on the F-droid icon.

This app is currently being developed and maintained by\n\n
Massimiliano:\n Current developer of the Disroot app
We used Diolinx as our starting base to create this app. Go check it out, it\'s free software as well!

Disroot app is developed free as in Freedom and follows the ideas of the Disroot Foundation. If you want to contribute, go ahead! Currently we are a very small team, so we greatly appreciate any kind of help!
The app is not available in your language? You can change that! Why don\'t you help us by translating it?
Disroot app is still in development, so if you have suggestions or any kind of feedback, please let us know!
Tell your friends and family about Disroot! Why don\'t you blog about your experiences? We\'d love to hear from you!
You can do a long press on each icon to show you extra information...
Jabber ID : Your full Disroot email address\\nPassword : Your Disroot password
Anonymous multi search engine platform aggregating the results of other search engines while not storing information about its users.
Framadate is an online service for planning an appointment or making a decision quickly and easily. No registration is required.

Taiga is a project management tool, developed for programmers, designers and startups working with agile methodology in mind. It can however be applied to virtually any project or group, even outside of IT realm.
Page to see the current stare of Disroot services
This site is dedicated to Howtos and tutorials to help you find your way around the various Disroot services.
This is the about page of this app
Discourse is a fully open-source modern approach to discussion forums. It offers everything your community, group or collective needs to create their communication platform.
